MakesYou.head: Our History
MakesYou.para: Sean (President) and Ben (CEO) have over 50 combined years of experience building outdoor living spaces. Through a fortuitous introduction they formed a strong friendship around a desire to improve the quality of life for clients by providing better solutions at attainable prices.

MakesYou.head: Our Futures
MakesYou.para: This is only the start. We are always innovating, seeking ways to improve not only our products, but our clientsâ€™ experiences. We believe that life lived outdoors is better for everyone.
